content: X-IE-GSP Insulation fastener Insulation fastener for installing continuous insulation directly to cold-formed steel stud framing without the use of sheathing ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster and more reliable way to install continuous insulation to cold-formed steel framing Sets to the correct depth, better preventing overdrive which damages the foil facing on insulation Removes the need for sheathing Applications Fastening continuous rigid board insulation directly to steel stud framing without the use of sheathing Fastening continuous mineral wool insulation directly to steel stud framing without the use of sheathing For 18-12 gauge steel stud framing ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Rigid Board Insulation Insulation material: Hard board (e.g. XPS, PUR, PIR), Mineral wool Base materials: Steel Technical Data | Application | Rigid Board Insulation | Insulation material | Hard board (e.g. XPS, PUR, PIR), Mineral wool | Base materials | Steel | For use with (tools) | GX-IE | Material | High-density polyethylene (HDPE) | Color | Brown | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3780249 -
